results.title: Simvastatin decreases accelerated graft vessel disease after heart transplantation in an animal model.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ decreases accelerated @<m>DISEASE_Cushing's_symphalangism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536223 @@@graft vessel disease@@@ after heart transplantation in an animal model.

citations.NLM: Meiser BM, Wenke K, Thiery J, Wolf S, Devens C, Seidel D, Hammer C, Billingham ME, Reichart B. Simvastatin decreases accelerated graft vessel disease after heart transplantation in an animal model. Transplant Proc. 1993 Apr;25(2):2077-9. PMID: 7682363
citations.BibTeX: @article{7682363, title={Simvastatin decreases accelerated graft vessel disease after heart transplantation in an animal model.}, author={Meiser BM and Wenke K and Thiery J and Wolf S and Devens C and Seidel D and Hammer C and Billingham ME and Reichart B}, journal={Transplant Proc}, volume={25}, number={2}, pages={2077-9}}

results.title: Simvastatin after orthotopic heart transplantation. Costs and consequences.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Cushing's_symphalangism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536223 @@@GVD@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ after heart transplantation was cost effective in all the scenarios examined with impressive prolongation of life expectancy for the heart recipient.

citations.NLM: Krobot KJ, Wenke K, Reichart B. Simvastatin after orthotopic heart transplantation. Costs and consequences. Pharmacoeconomics. 1999 Mar;15(3):279-89. PMID: 10537435
citations.BibTeX: @article{10537435, title={Simvastatin after orthotopic heart transplantation. Costs and consequences.}, author={Krobot KJ and Wenke K and Reichart B}, journal={Pharmacoeconomics}, volume={15}, number={3}, pages={279-89}}

results.title: Simvastatin reduces graft vessel disease and mortality after heart transplantation: a four-year randomized trial.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ reduces @DISEASE_Pancreatitis_Graft @DISEASE_MESH:D055589 @@@graft@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Cushing's_symphalangism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536223 @@@vessel disease@@@ and mortality after heart transplantation: a four-year randomized trial.

citations.NLM: Wenke K, Meiser B, Thiery J, Nagel D, von Scheidt W, Steinbeck G, Seidel D, Reichart B. Simvastatin reduces graft vessel disease and mortality after heart transplantation: a four-year randomized trial. Circulation. 1997 Sep 2;96(5):1398-402. PMID: 9315523

results.title: What is the role of lipid lowering therapy in heart-allograft failure?
results.text_hl: The one year angiographies revealed @<m>DISEASE_Cushing's_symphalangism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536223 @@@GVD@@@ in 24.1% of the control and 12.1% of the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ group (Study I).

citations.NLM: Reichart B, Meiser BM, Wenke K, Brandl U, Seidel D, Thiery J. What is the role of lipid lowering therapy in heart-allograft failure? Kidney Int Suppl. 1995 Dec;52():S52-5. PMID: 8587284
